rationale: The segment reports a suspected case investigation but does not contain an intensifier modifying a risk-adjective.
statement_text: Brazil is investigating a suspected case of avian influenza A (H5N1) in a person living in the southeastern state of Espirito Santo, where this week the first ever confirmed cases in wild birds were detected, the Health Ministry said.

rationale: This is a factual statement about an investigation and detected cases, without using high-potency language.
statement_text: Brazil is investigating a suspected case of avian influenza A (H5N1) in a person living in the southeastern state of Espirito Santo, where this week the first ever confirmed cases in wild birds were detected, the Health Ministry said.
